DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Bracing Preventing Scoliosis Children With Spinal Cord Injury
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize control trial determine effectiveness high dose bracing ( ≥ 23 hour per day ) low dose bracing ( ≤ 12 hour per day ) skeletally immature child Spinal Cord Injury . Subjects randomize either prophylactic high dose-bracing group ( ≥ 23 hour per day ) low dose-bracing group ( ≤ 12 hour per day ) . Subjects stratify age ( young age 10 old age 10 ) , curve severity ( < 20 degree 20-40 degree ) use match random block design .
